choice_desc: Choose one or many answers (e.g. text, image, audio, video) in a predefined list of choices.
cloze_desc: Fill gaps with relevant items in the context. It's possible to fill it either by writing in a text box or by choosing the item in a predefined list.
graphic_desc: Point one or many areas on an image.
match_desc: Link an item (e.g. text, image, audio, video) with one or many others (e.g. text, image, audio, video).
open_desc: Answer a question with a text that may contain resources (e.g. text, image, audio, video). The open question requires a manual correction.
pair_desc: Put items (e.g. text, image, audio, video) in pairs.
set_desc: Move items (e.g. text, image, audio, video) inside sets.
words_desc: Write an answer with one or many expected keywords.
grid_desc: Bridging gaps in a table. They can be completed either by writing a text or by choosing the item from a predefined list.
boolean_desc: Choose between two answers true / false, yes / no or any other personalized pair.
selection_desc: Search, pick or highlight a zone of text.
